name: ZeroPath
long_description: ZeroPath is a developer tool that autonomously detects, verifies, and submits fixes for vulnerabilities in your code. Engineers can link their existing SAST tools to ZeroPath for validation and triage, significantly reducing the time and cost per vulnerability fix. Developers can also easily modify patches or perform regular development tasks by issuing natural language commands to @zeropath-ai in pull requests.
one_liner: Automatically find, verify, and fix web app vulnerabilities
